abstract: Securities regulators issued an official warning that shares once associated with General Motors are likely to be worthless, amid continued confusion from some investors about which company the stock represents.
snippet: Securities regulators issued an official warning that shares once associated with General Motors are likely to be worthless, amid continued confusion from some investors about which company the stock represents.
lead_paragraph: Update | 6:42 p.m. For those investors who think the stock ticker once associated with General Motors may regain some value, securities regulators have this to say: think again.

headline.main: Regulators Issue Warning for G.M.’s Former Stock

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
